name: scimax-vscode
description: Scientific computing environment inspired by Emacs Scimax - journal, literate programming, org-mode enhancements

commands.title: Scimax: Go to Next Code Block

scimax.journal.directory.description: Directory for journal files. If empty, uses ~/scimax-journal

scimax.journal.template.description: Template name for new journal entries

scimax.journal.dateFormat.description: Date format for journal file names

scimax.journal.autoTimestamp.description: Automatically add timestamps to log entries

scimax.journal.weekStartsOn.description: First day of the week in calendar view

scimax.db.directories.description: Additional directories to index for search

scimax.db.excludePatterns.description: Glob patterns to exclude from indexing

scimax.db.ignorePatterns.description: Patterns for files to ignore during indexing

scimax.db.autoIndex.description: Automatically index workspace files on activation. Disable for large workspaces to prevent memory issues.

scimax.db.embeddingProvider.description: Embedding provider for semantic search (local uses Transformers.js)

scimax.db.localModel.description: Local embedding model (downloads on first use)

scimax.literate.pythonPath.description: Path to Python executable for code execution

scimax.ref.pdfDirectory.description: Directory containing PDF files for references

scimax.notebook.directory.description: Default parent directory for new notebooks

scimax.hydra.showKeyHints.description: Show keyboard shortcuts inline with menu items

scimax.hydra.singleKeySelection.description: Select menu items with a single keypress (no Enter needed)

scimax.hydra.dimNonMatching.description: Dim menu items that don't match the current filter

scimax.hydra.sortByKey.description: Sort menu items by their keyboard shortcut
